item.title: What is a Cloned Phone Line?
item.description: Phone Power’s 12-month prepaid VoIP service, already a great value with almost unlimited U.S. and Canada calling and a free second year, also includes a unique “cloned 2nd line” feature. This raises the question: is this a true second phone line, and why is it called “cloned”? Essentially, this feature provides the functionality of nearly two lines for the price of one. It utilizes the two RJ-11 jacks found on most telephone interface adapters, which connect your phone to your broadband modem or router.
